info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:23AM CDT until July 07 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 423 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hooker, or 19 miles southwest of Liberal, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hooker, Tyrone, Turpin, Baker and Adams. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
